OOC:
OK, since Panzer was unconsious, I can't really call it moding since 
she's out cold. However, grabbing of the mouse like that, yeah, 
that's just a bit on the moding side. However, for the sake of time,
(especially since I wasn't able to get on line for two days, I'll 
just pick up with it. Just let's be careful in the future.

DarkMouse:
She was shaking a little bit. Realizing that the dragon could have 
swallowed her in two bites. She looked up at Neptune. "Uh, thank you 
for saving my tail back there. I...uh...well...Just thanks."
She was a bit upset at herself for not putting up much of a fight. 
Next time though, she's make thier mech fluid flow like water in a 
river. She wanted to get to a nice warm chamber and recoop for a 
bit.  She looked down at her tail with the burnt tip and sighed. OH 
well, there will be more fights in the future, she told herself.
